name: Swiggity Swaggity Shootin' in Space
description:
Traverse through two (2) entire exciting levels as you battle the evil space monsters and bring your spaceship to victory, collecting power-ups and listening to a dope original soundtrack along the way! A quick little sidescrolling shooter I made while learning how to use GM.

Made in GameMaker Studio.

(December 2015 ~~ DJ)
